title: 'We don't know' what the limits are for RNA therapies
author: Helen Floersh
description: Messenger RNA went from "a technology looking for a disease" to a global phenomenon in what seems like an instant thanks to the COVID-19 vaccines. | Thanks to the success of Moderna and BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccines, the question is no longer whether RNA technology can be put to use but where its limits lie.
